additional_info:
Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Alarm System, Generator, Heating - Conditioning, Heating system: electricity 
 Commercial store-front space for rent in Tbilisi in a high-foot traffic area on Marjanishvili St. # 5 (in close proximity to Marjanishivili Theater and TBC Bank). The commercial store-front space is located on the 1st floor directly across the street from Marjanishvili Theater. The commercial store-front space is made up of 47 sq. meters (of which 19 sq. meters are a loft). Price is $1,500 USD/ month equivalent in Georgian Lari. The price includes the following: 1 parking spot (additional pay parking available) and VAT.
